duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility and promote the company's global presence.
Lead the Global Brand Experience team, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set goals.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Manage the company's online presence, optimizing the website and social media channels for maximum engagement and conversions.
Plan and oversee the execution of experiential activations, events, client/partner/showroom spaces, and innovative virtual and hybrid experiences.
Facilitate ongoing, timely, and proactive executive communications regarding key projects and brand experiences.
Discover and champion creativity, bringing innovative and first-to-market experiential ideas to the table.
Manage relationships with new and existing venues, vendors, and fabrication shops.
